title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Trends in tractor design. Engine performance. Selection of engine for tractors. Design of principal engine components. Design of engine systems. Tractor clutches and brakes. Design of power transmission systems. Design and selection of ground drive components. Design and performance evaluation of traction and transport devices.
